text.value: Check out the official first look images from Hulu’s
, starring
and
Here’s a synopsis: The film follows three strangers (
and

) who share an obsession with true crime and suddenly find themselves wrapped up in one. When a grisly death occurs inside their exclusive Upper West Side apartment building, the trio suspects murder and employs their precise knowledge of true crime to investigate the truth. As they record a podcast of their own to document the case, the three unravel the complex secrets of the building which stretch back years. Perhaps even more explosive are the lies they tell one another. Soon, the endangered trio comes to realize a killer might be living amongst them as they race to decipher the mounting clues before it’s too late.
The series is set to debut on Hulu on August 31!
A new report has emerged about the advancement of
and
and the rumors that they are possibly dating again, years after their 2004 breakup.
A source is speaking out about what’s new with the 51-year-old entertainer and 48-year-old actor.
‘s baby is royalty!
The 32-year-old daughter of
and
‘s daughter
her first child with husband
earlier in the week.
Now, it’s been revealed that the baby will also be receiving a royal title.
In honor of
’s exclusive World Bee Day interview with
, the famed magazine released this amazing new photo!

The 45-year-old actress, director, and humanitarian said to the mag, “With so much we are worried about around the world and so many people feeling overwhelmed with bad news and the reality of what is collapsing, this is one that we can manage. We can certainly all step in and do our part.”

“I don’t think a lot of people know what damage they’re doing. A lot of people are just trying to get through their day,” she added. “They want to do good. They don’t want to be destructive. They don’t know which thing to buy. They don’t know which thing to use. So I think part of this is wanting to help it be simple for everybody, because I need that.”

“I have six kids and a lot happening and I don’t know how to be the ‘perfect’ anything. And so if we can help each other to say, ‘This is a way forward, simple, and this is something you can do with your kids,’” she added.
is reacting to criticism.

‘s
, out in September.
Following
that debuted on Tuesday (May 18), online reaction was mixed regarding
playing a high school student.
has announced the full list of movies and television shows heading to the streaming service beginning on June 1, and there are so many exciting offerings coming up.
This list contains a ton of different classic and upcoming movies, as well as new and old seasons of television shows.
One of the most noticeable new additions? The entire eight-movie suite of
films, from
to
Plus, watch out for some big new movies, including
and
, the sequel to
, is shaping up to have one amazing cast!
will be returning as the leading role of Southern detective Benoit Blanc.
Amazon has renewed
for a second season, and the first season just wrapped filming and has not debuted yet!
The show is a fantasy series based on
’s best-selling novels, and stars
in the leading role of Moiraine.
“The belief Amazon Studios and Sony Pictures Television have shown in

has been incredible to see throughout the entire process of making this show. Getting a second season order before the first season has even premiered is such a vote of confidence in the work we are doing and the property itself, and we couldn’t be happier to be able to continue to live and work in the world Robert Jordan created,” showrunner and executive producer

in a statement. “This property is one I’ve loved since I was a teenager, and seeing it brought to life with the resources to make it truly worthy of what’s on the page is something I can’t wait for the other fans of the books to see. And season two just keeps expanding the world we built in season one.”
Check out a quick feature that Amazon debuted featuring Rosamund’s character.

is teasing his big song pick!
The 44-year-old country music star made an appearance on
on Wednesday night (May 19).
During his appearance,
teased that he’s picked out the song he and soon-to-be wife
will dance to as their first dance.
“What’s your first song? Can you tell me?”
asked.
“I think it’s called ‘The Wedding March,’”
amusingly responded.
“Not that song!”
reacted.
It’s that time of year where each of the television networks reveals the full slate of television renewals and cancellations.
Unfortunately,
has decided to cancel 4 shows and announced one is officially coming to an end.
Luckily, several shows have been renewed as well, including several fan favorites.
has some regrets.
The 47-year-old president of
spoke out about Doctor Strange, and the casting of
as The Ancient One, in an interview with
The casting was criticized as being an example of whitewashing in Hollywood, as the character in the comic books is an Asian male.
